about_the_game:
DODGE OR DIE 💀

Learn to Dodge is a bullet hell dodging game from Timeflier Games. Improve your dodging skills in this fast paced game. Each map has three difficulties so you can work your way up to dodge like the masters. On full release this game will have:

  • 4 maps with 3 difficulties each, as well as a prologue and epilogue, for a total of 14 maps.
  • Each map has it's own leaderboard, as well as the ability to select a player's best time and a race their ghost to the finish.
  • Over a dozen hazards, such as grenades, spiders, trapdoors, and slime!
  • Collectibles placed on each level, including coins that you can spend on skins!

The demo includes the prologue and the first level with 3 difficulties for a total of 4 maps.
